explanation: Funds are required to support Operation & Main

Funds are available as a result of mobilizations in support of emergent funded missions (i.e. Operation Allies Welcome, Ukraine support, etc.) offsetting a portion of the budgeted Active Duty foy Operational Support (ADOS) program. Due to these emergent requirements, the Officer ADOS program is projected to underexecute by 98 workyears. This will not impact military readiness activities,
